replies.body: {{sticker:sg-ahri-3}} How about funding into dopamine addiction linked to gaming

If you're passionate about this, you should check out some of the resources headspace and LeVa helped put together on managing your game time responsibly and share them with others.

https://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/level-up-your-mental-health

I suspect that's something Riot wont be too keen on funding...

\*Obsessively opening all my lootboxes in Hextech Crafting\*

^ This!!

Gambling is so rampant throughout the gaming industry, it's absolutely disgusting....

{{sticker:sg-jinx}} 
Yummy donation skin, also thanks Riot for caring about the world
why don't you help out with the Australian bushfires
Because our dodgy government won't even help out with that
please help with the australian bushfires with some of the donations
make a skin specifically for charity and ill buy it.
